V03vinv06_u:524_9: na kenacid asmākam ekākinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhojayitavyaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:524_11: yo yuṣmākam ekākī bhojayati sa gaṇena ṣaṣṭiṃ kārṣāpaṇān daṇḍya iti /
V03vinv06_u:524_12: atha pāpeyā mallāḥ sarve saṃbhūya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
V03vinv06_u:524_13: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ /
V03vinv06_u:524_14: ekāntaniṣaṇṇān pāpeyān mallān bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya pūrvavad yāvat saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
V03vinv06_u:524_15: atha pāpeyā mallā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
V03vinv06_u:524_16: adhivāsayatv asmākaṃ bhagavan* śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
V03vinv06_u:524_18: atha pāpeyā mallā bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:524_22: sa kathayati / nāhaṃ śrāddhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ / kin tu gaṇena kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:524_23: pūrvavad yāvat ṣaṣṭiṃ kārṣāpaṇān daṇḍya iti /
V03vinv06_u:524_27: ayaṃ bhadanta roco mallamahāmātro na buddhe 'bhiprasanno na dharme na saṃghe 'bhiprasannaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:524_28: sādhv asya bhagavāṃs tathā dharmaṃ deśayed yathaiṣa buddhe 'bhiprasīded dharme saṃghe abhiprasīded iti /
V03vinv06_u:524_30: atha bhagavatā rocasya mahāmātrasya tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā roco mallamahāmātro buddhe 'bhiprasanno dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasannaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:524_31: atha roco mallamahāmātraḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāṃjalīṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat* /
V03vinv06_u:524_32: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān* śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
V03vinv06_u:524_34: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā pāpeyā mallā (fol.
V03vinv06_u:524_35: 238v1 = GBM 6.789) anujñāsyanti / sacet te roca pāpeyā mallā anujñāsyanti evaṃ te 'ham adhivāsayāmi /
V03vinv06_u:524_36: atha roco mallamahāmātro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrānto yena pāpeyā mallās tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:524_38: āgamayantu tāvad bhavanto yāvad ahaṃ tatprathamataraṃ bhagavantaṃ bhojaye bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca /
V03vinv06_u:524_39: paścād yuṣmākam api (MSV I 284) na duṣkaraṃ bhaviṣyati bhagavantaṃ bhojayituṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca /
V03vinv06_u:524_40: te kathayanti / asmābhis tatprathamataraṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantrito na vayam anujānīma iti /
V03vinv06_u:524_41: sa kathayati / yadi nānujānītha ekaṃ khādyakaṃ cārayāmi pānakaṃ ceti /
V03vinv06_u:524_43: bhavanta aśrāddha eṣaḥ / anujānīmaḥ sacet saṃghagatā tena dakṣiṇā pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavati /
V03vinv06_u:524_44: tair anujñātam* / tatas tena śilpina āhūya uktāḥ /
V03vinv06_u:524_45: bhavantas tādṛśaṃ khādyakaṃ sajjīkuruta yenaikenaiva paryāptir bhavati ahaṃ sarvopakaraṇāni dadāmīti /
V03vinv06_u:524_49: atha pāpeyā mallās tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya
V03vinv06_u:524_50: pūrvavad yāvat purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇāḥ /
V03vinv06_u:524_51: tato roco mallamahāmātraḥ khādyakaṃ cārayitum ārabdhaḥ pānakaṃ ca /
V03vinv06_u:524_55: kathayanti / āryā lakṣitā vayaṃ rocena mallamahāmātreṇa /
V03vinv06_u:524_56: pratigṛhṇīdhvam iti / tato rocena mallamahāmātreṇa khādyakaṃ cāritam* /
V03vinv06_u:524_59: pāpeyānāṃ mallānām asāv āhāraḥ paribhogaṃ na gataḥ /
V03vinv06_u:525_2: ehi buddha ehi dharma ehi saṃgha idaṃ gṛhāṇeti /
V03vinv06_u:525_4: bhagavān āha / praṣṭavyaḥ kiṃ mamānuprayacchatha āhosvid yo 'sau bhagavān dvipadānām agrya iti /
V03vinv06_u:525_5: yadi kathayanti yo 'sau bhagavān dvipadānām agrya iti /
V03vinv06_u:525_6: na svīkartavyam* / atha kathayanti / tvam evāsmākaṃ buddha iti pratigrahītvyam* /
V03vinv06_u:525_7: nātra kaukṛtyaṃ karaṇīyam* / evaṃ dharme vaktavyaṃ yo 'sau virāgāṇām agrya iti /
V03vinv06_u:525_8: saṃghe vaktavyaṃ yo 'sau gaṇānām agrya iti /
V03vinv06_u:526_0: śrāvastyāṃ nidānam* / anyatamena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho jentākenopanimantritaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:526_1: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān svātir navāgatas taruṇo 'cirapravrajitaḥ acirāgata imaṃ dharmavinayam* /
V03vinv06_u:526_2_0: sa saṃlakṣayati / uktaṃ bhagavatā yaiś cālpaṃ dattaṃ yaiś ca prabhūtaṃ dattaṃ yaiś
V03vinv06_u:526_2_1: ca praṇītaṃ dattaṃ yaiś cāttamanaskaiḥ parikarma kṛtaṃ yaiś ca prasannacittair abhyanumoditaṃ
V03vinv06_u:526_3: 239r1 = GBM 6.790) sarve te puṇyasya bhāgino bhavanti /
V03vinv06_u:526_5: sa kāṣṭhaṃ pāṭayitum ārabdho yāvad anyatamasmāt pūtidārusuṣirān niṣkramyāśīviṣeṇa dakṣiṇe pādāṅguṣṭhe dṛṣṭaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:526_6: sa viṣeṇa saṃmūrchito bhūmau patito lālā vāhayati mukhaṃ ca vibhaṇḍayati akṣiṇī ca saṃparivartayati /
V03vinv06_u:526_8: te kathayanti / bhavantaḥ katarasyāyaṃ gṛhapateḥ putra iti /
V03vinv06_u:526_9: aparaiḥ samākhyātam* / amukasya iti / te kathayanti / anāthānāṃ śramaṇaśākyaputrīyāṇāṃ madhye pravrajitaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:526_10: yadi na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyat* jñātibhir asya cikitsā kāritā abhaviṣyad iti /
V03vinv06_u:526_11: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata (MSV I 286) ārocayanti /
V03vinv06_u:526_12: bhagavān āha / vaidyaṃ pṛṣṭvā cikitsā kartavyeti /
V03vinv06_u:526_13: bhikṣubhir vaidyaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ / sa kathayati / āryā vikṛtabhojanam anuprayacchateti /
V03vinv06_u:526_15: bhagavān āha / dātavyaṃ vaidyopadeśeneti / bhikṣavo na jānate kīdṛśaṃ vikṛtabhojanam iti /
V03vinv06_u:526_16: tair vaidyaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ / sa kathayati / āryā yuṣmākam eva śāstā sarvajño bhagavān sarvadarśī sa eva jñāsyatīti /
V03vinv06_u:526_18: bhagavān āha / vikṛtabhojanaṃ bhikṣava uccāraḥ prasrāvaś chāyikā mṛttikā ca /
V03vinv06_u:526_19: tatra uccāraḥ acirajātakānāṃ vatsakānāṃ teṣām eva ca prasrāvaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:526_20: chāyikā paṃcānāṃ vṛkṣāṇām* / kāṃcanaya kamībalasyāśvatthasyodumbarasya nyagrodhasya /
V03vinv06_u:526_21: mṛttikā pṛthivyāṃ caturaṃgulam apanīyoddhartavyā iti vikṛtabhojanam iti /
V03vinv06_u:527_0: tato bhikṣubhir āyuṣmataḥ svāter vikṛtabhojanaṃ dattam* /
V03vinv06_u:527_1: tathāpi na svasthībhavati / etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti /
V03vinv06_u:527_2_0: bhagavān āha / śakṣyasi tvam ānanda mamāntikān mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyām udgṛhya paryavāpya
V03vinv06_u:527_2_1: svāter bhikṣo rakṣāṃ kartuṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ viṣanāśanaṃ
V03vinv06_u:527_3: bhāṣatāṃ bhagavān śroṣyāmi / atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāṃ bhāṣate sma /
V03vinv06_u:528_1: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /

V03vinv06_u:529_1: sarvamaṅgalasādhani / manase / mānase / mahāmānase / acyute adbhute atyadbhute mukte mocani mokṣaṇi araje viraje /
V03vinv06_u:529_2: amṛte / amare amaraṇi brahme brahmasvare pūrṇe pūrṇamanorathe mukte jīvati rakṣā svātiṃ sarvopadravabhayarogebhyaḥ svāhā /
V03vinv06_u:530_0: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavato 'ntikān mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyām udgṛhya paryavāpya svāter bhikṣoḥ svastyayanaṃ kṛtam* /
V03vinv06_u:531_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
V03vinv06_u:531_1: āscaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac ca bhagavatā mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā bahukarā ca /
V03vinv06_u:531_2: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā mamātīte 'py adhvany akṣaṇapratipannasya (fol.
V03vinv06_u:531_3: 239v1 = GBM 6.791) vinipatitaśarīrasyāpi mahāmāyūrī vidyārājā upakarā bahukarā ca /
V03vinv06_u:532_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo himavati parvatarāje dakṣiṇe pārśve suvarṇāvabhāso nāma mayūrarājaḥ prativasati sma /
V03vinv06_u:532_1: so 'nayā mahāmāyūryā vidyayā kālyaṃ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā divā svastyayanena viharati /
V03vinv06_u:532_2: so 'yaṃ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā rātrau svastyayanena viharati /
V03vinv06_u:532_3_0: so 'pareṇa samayena saṃbahulābhir vanamayūrībhiḥ sārdham ārāmeṇārāmam udyānenodyānaṃ
V03vinv06_u:532_3_1: parvatapārśveṇa parvatapārśvam atyarthaṃ kāmarāgaraktaḥ kāme 'nugṛddho grathito mūrchito
V03vinv06_u:532_3_2: madamattaḥ pramūḍhaḥ pramūrchitaḥ (MSV I 288) pravicaran prasādād anyataraṃ parvatavivaram
V03vinv06_u:532_4: sa tatra dīrgharātraṃ pratyarthikaiḥ pratyamitrair hiṃsakair avatāraprekṣibhir mayūrapāśair baddhaḥ /
V03vinv06_u:532_5: so 'py atra madhyagataḥ pramūḍhaḥ smṛtiṃ ca labdhvā imām eva mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāṃ manasyakārṣīt* /
